channel.title: blog on Neelanjana
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Neelanjana

item.title: Downsizing private property to communist and capitalistic perspective.
item.description: To understand arguments made by philosophers about private property we must first have some abstract knowledge as to what private property entails and its origins.

item.title: The business of ideas
item.description: The earliest impression I have had of advertising is that it’s simply a piece of content that serves the purpose of delivering information about a product, with the result being sales.

item.title: Guide to chaotic nerves
item.description: I have been a nervous person since the hour of birth.

item.title: Happy Socks - copy
item.description: Happy Socks is a Swedish manufacturer and retailer of socks, underwear, and swimwear.

item.title: Love beyond language
item.description: Frederick the Great of Prussia, a man of accomplishments in both political and intellectual, having a cruel childhood turned to the companionship of his pet dogs for comfort.

item.title: Week X of quarantine
item.description: COVID 19 hit us like a drunk driver and spread around the world, causing a global pandemic, before we could say knife.
